name: Snehi
briefDescription: Snehi works with people primarily to promote positive mental health & wellbeing, to stunt mental disorders, to prevent psychosocial disabilities and to ensure human rights of people with psychosocial disabilities through a. Counselling services for all age groups b. Helpline services for students i.e., telephonic counselling, c. community mental health with destitute children, d. capacity building & education to bridge the gap & reduce stigma and e. advocacy. Snehi also works with children through remedial & bridge education and life skills development programmes.
